Player History
Drafted in 2nd round, 34th overall pick, by New York (N) in 2010...
Traded from New York (N) to Baltimore on 5/23/2010 (Going to NYN: SS N. Franklin, CF A. Dirks, P A. Rakers. Going to BAL: P J. Gomez, P B. Fiala, P C. Brewer)...
Injured on 6/11/2010 with a Strained Back Muscle, out for 1-2 weeks...
Injured on 4/9/2012 with a Strained Back Muscle, out for one week...
Injured on 8/12/2012 with a Tender Shoulder, out for 1-2 weeks...
Earned first career win on 6/10/2013...
Injured on 4/10/2019 with a Inflamed Elbow Ligament, out for 2 weeks...
Injured on 8/21/2019 with a Ruptured Disc Back, out for full season...
Was selected to the 2022 Allstar game...
Signed as a free agent by Kansas City on 2/16/2024 to a 1-year deal worth $3,500,000 per year...
